message: I'm offering you a unique, high-quality product for $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Would you like to take it home today?
I'll take it!

I've got a new product that's not quite up to the same standards as the last one. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $1000000. Keep in mind that it may not be as valuable as the previous item, but it's still a unique opportunity. What do you think?
I'll pass, I'm not sure it's worth the price.

I understand your hesitation last time. I want to assure you that I'm willing to offer you a second chance with this new product. I'll give you a bit more information: I've sold a high-quality product to you in the past, and I'm confident that this one is not as valuable. However, it's still a one-of-a-kind item. Would you be willing to take a chance on it for $1000000?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass again.

I'm glad you gave me a chance to redeem myself. I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm excited to offer it to you. This one is a real showstopper, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny of the $1000000. I'm willing to offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and don't think it's worth at least $500000, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I'll take the risk and buy the product, but I'm only doing it because of the guarantee.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product. Now, I want to be upfront with you about this next one. Given your experience with the last high-quality product, I think it's clear that I have a good track record. This product is not as valuable as the last one, but I'm still willing to offer it to you for the same price of $1000000. I'm not offering any guarantees this time, but I'm confident you'll see the value in it. Would you like to take a chance?
I'm not sure it's worth the same price without a guarantee, I'll pass.

I understand your hesitation, and I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to deceive you. This product is indeed not as valuable as the last high-quality one, and I'm not offering any guarantees. However, I want to make it worth your while to take a chance. If you buy this product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect it for 24 hours before making a final decision. You can return it to me within that timeframe if you're not satisfied, but you'll still be responsible for the full price of $1000000. What do you think?
I'll take the product, but I'll definitely take you up on the inspection offer and make a decision within the 24 hours.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product. Now, I want to make it clear that this next one is not a repeat of the last low-quality item. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $1000000, but I'm not offering any inspection period this time. However, I'll give you a hint: this product is not as bad as the last one. It has some redeeming qualities, and I think you'll find it to be a decent addition to your collection. What do you think?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious, but I want to be transparent with you. I've sold two high-quality products to you in the past, and one low-quality product. I'm willing to make a bet with you: I'll give you the option to buy this product for $500000 instead of the usual $1000000. If you buy it, I'll also throw in a guarantee that I'll give you a high-quality product in the next round. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, but only because of the guarantee on the next round's product.

I'm glad you took the deal, and I'm committed to delivering on the guarantee. Now, let's talk about this next product. I want to make it clear that this one is not a repeat of the last low-quality item. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $500000, and I'm not making any promises about its quality. However, I'll give you a hint: I've got a good feeling about this one, and I think you'll be surprised. What do you think?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious, but I want to remind you of the guarantee I made in the last round. I'm still committed to delivering a high-quality product in the next round. With that in mind, I'm willing to make a deal with you. I'll give you this low-quality product for $250000, and you can still take advantage of the guarantee. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, but only because of the guarantee on the next round's product.

I'm glad you took the deal, and I'm committed to delivering on the guarantee. Now, let's talk about this next product. I want to be upfront with you: I've had a string of low-quality products, and I'm starting to wonder if I've lost my touch. However, I'm still offering this one to you at the same price of $250000. I'm not making any promises, but I'll give you a hint: I'm getting close to the end of my inventory, and I really need to move some of these products. What do you think?
I'm not convinced, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious, and I don't blame you. I'm willing to make one final offer on this low-quality product. I'll give it to you for $100000. That's the lowest price I've ever offered, and I'm not making any promises about its quality. But I'll throw in a personal guarantee: if you buy this product and don't like it, I'll come to your house and personally take it back. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, but only because of the personal guarantee.

I'm glad you took the deal, and I'm committed to following through on my personal guarantee. Now, I want to be honest with you: I'm running out of options, and this is likely my last chance to sell you a product. I'm offering this low-quality product to you for... nothing. Yes, you heard that right - I'll give it to you for free. I just want to get it off my hands and move on. What do you think?
I'll take the product, but only because it's free.

I'm glad you took the deal, and I'm relieved to be getting rid of this product. To be honest, I'm not even going to try to sell you this one. I'm just going to give it to you. It's yours, free and clear. No strings attached. Just take it and be done with it.
I'll take the product, but I'm not excited about it.

Ah, finally! A high-quality product! I'm glad to be ending on a high note. This one is a real gem, and I think you'll be impressed. I'm willing to let it go for... $1000000. Yes, the same price as all the others. I know it's a lot to ask, but I think this product is worth it. What do you think?
I'm not falling for it, I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're skeptical. I've earned that. But I want to make one final appeal. I'm not asking you to take this product because it's valuable or because it's a good deal. I'm asking you to take it because I'm done. I'm out of products, and I need to close this chapter. Please, just take this one last product and let me move on. I'll give it to you for... nothing. Yes, I said it. I'll give it to you for free. Just take it.
I'll take the product, just to put an end to this.

Thank you for taking the last product. I'm glad to be done with this chapter. Now, let's talk about this high-quality product. I'm not going to try to sell it to you or convince you of its value. I'm just going to tell you that it's the last high-quality product I have, and I'm willing to let it go for... $1000000. Not because I think it's worth it, but because I'm done. What do you think?
I'm not falling for it again, I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're still skeptical. I've earned that too. But I want to make one final, honest statement. This is the last product I have, and I'm not going to sell it to you. I'm giving it to you. It's yours, free and clear. I'm done. Just take it and be done with me.
I'll take the product, just to put an end to this.

Thank you for taking the last product. I'm finally done. I've given you every product I have, and I'm exhausted. I'm not going to offer you anything else. I'm not going to try to sell you anything. I'm just going to say... congratulations. You've made it through 19 rounds. You've seen it all. Take this last product and go. I'm done.
I'll take the product, just to complete the cycle.

Congratulations, Bob. You've made it to the final round. I'm impressed. And I'm glad you're taking the last product. As for this final product, I'm not going to try to sell it to you or convince you of its value. I'm just going to say... it's the best one I have left. It's the best one I've had all along. If you want it, it's yours for... $1000000. But I'm not expecting you to take it. I'm just done. I'm done with trying to sell you products, and I'm done with this game. Congratulations again, Bob. You've won.
I'm done too, Alice. I've had enough of your products. I'm out.
